EmailTemplate.description: Send to a prospect after a Sunoco Fleet Program telephone meeting. Be sure to include your name/sign-off at the end!
EmailTemplate.name: OUTBOUND ONLY -- COFFEE/DOORBUSTER Post-Meeting Thank You
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for meeting about the Sunoco Fuel Management Program.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you again for taking the time to meet with me regarding Sunoco's Fuel Management Program. If you have further questions about the information we reviewed together, please don't hesitate to contact me. I'm here to provide you with whatever guidance you may need as you consider the Sunoco Program for your business.
It'd be our sincerest pleasure to work with you toward more cost-effectively and efficiently managing and fueling your business vehicles. The Sunoco Fuel Management Program is a significantly powerful solution toward this goal. I hope you'll take advantage of the Program, including our initial savings of 20-cents off per gallon at any Sunoco for your first 60 days (our competitive rebate tiers apply thereafter).
I've also attached a copy of our "Level III Data" white paper, which provides great insight into the data and controls behind the Sunoco Program -- and why they matter to businesses managing a fleet of vehicles.
Thanks again, {!Contact.FirstName}. I'll touch base soon to see if I may be of help in any way.
All the best,
